casebody.data:
WALKER & STATEN
v.
FLEETWOOD HOMES. No. 223A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 11, 2006. Philip J. Mohr, Winston-Salem, for Fleetwood Homes. William F. Ward, III, for Walkers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of May 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Fleetwood Homes) shall have up to and including the 2nd day of June 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of May 2006."
